page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Our area is largely an agricultural one with the river Ouse and the city of York close by. It is divided into three main villages,Copmanthorpe, Acaster Malbis being west of the river and Naburn east of the river. As we are very close to the city of York,the inhabitants of the area rely for their shopping and entertainment on the city. We are affected only marginally by the tourists visiting the city,their presence is noticed mainly by a number of caraban sites in the area and the busy traffic on the A64 motorway.All three villages particu_ larly Copmanthorpe,have seen alot of new housing over the last ten years consisting of mainly new estates. Despite this there is a lively community spirit still to be felt in all three villages.
